messages.content: 9-1-1, what's your emergency?
Somebody just came in and shot my daughter and my husband.
They shot them? Are they conscious?
She's bleeding out. Please, ma'am, she's bleeding.
How old is your daughter?
She's 10.
And where were they shot?
In the head.
Should I pick her up?
No, I want you to leave her where she is. Are they still there?
They're coming back in! They're coming back in!
Do you know who they are?
*Incoherent shouting*
Hello? Are you still there? Are you okay?
Ma'am, I don't know. I'm scared.
Okay, how many people were there?
I don't know, ma'am. I was asleep, and I can't even move. I've been shot myself.
Okay, where were you shot?
I think I'm shot in the leg. I'm not sure, ma'am.
Are you armed?
Yes.
Emergency services are coming. Please stay on the line.
Did you see any of them?
No, I didn't. I just got up, ma'am. They told us someone escaped from jail and wanted to come in, then they just shot my husband, my daughter, and me.
You said they wanted to come in because of an escaped person?
Yes, they said the property was surrounded with Border Patrol.
How long is it going to take for them to get here?
They are on their way. Are they still in the house?
I don't know, ma'am. I'm just here bleeding like crazy, and I have this gun loaded.
What kind of gun do you have?
I don't know, it's just a handgun.
Where in the house are you?
I'm in the kitchen, staring at the door.
Are you with your husband and your daughter?
No, I don't want to look at them.
What kind of vehicles do you have on your property?
I have a black suburban and a white truck. I don't know if they stole anything.
Did it sound like males were talking?
There was a male and a shorter, fat woman.
Okay, and what did the woman look like? Was she Hispanic?
No, she was white.
And you mentioned you have one of their guns?
Yes, but I haven't touched it.
Okay, don't touch it.
I think one of them came back for the gun.
Did you see any of them?
No, they were gone by the time I got back up.
Did you shoot at them?
Yes.
Do you know if you hit any of them?
No.
Okay. Did you hear any vehicles speed off?
I just heard some doors shut.
How long until they get here?
They should be in the area. They're checking the surroundings.
I can't move, ma'am. My leg is killing me.
Keep some pressure on it, okay?
I'm trying. What am I going to do?
We'll get someone to you. Okay, try to stay calm.
I think they might have been looking for money.
Do you think it was a mistake or someone with a grudge?
I don't know. Maybe. I just don't know.
Which leg was shot?
My right leg.
Keep pressure on it.
They said they surrounded the house. They had guns taped.
Okay.
And the male, was he also white?
Yes, the female was white, and a Mexican man came in too.
Okay, so there was a white male, a white female, and a Mexican male?
Yes, and they shot me. I pretended I was dead. My daughter was crying, so they shot her too.
They shot her again after the first time you told me?
Yes, like two or three times.
Is there anyone else in the house?
No, just us.
Do you have any pets in the house?
We have dogs, but they ran out when this happened.
Stay with me until someone gets there. We have units in the area.
Okay.
My daughter got in a fight with a girl last week. Maybe it has something to do with it.
Were there any drugs mentioned, or were they just looking for money?
They just said hurry up and get what we need. We don't have drugs or anything like that.
Do you think it was a mistake?
I don't know.
Does your leg feel swollen?
Yes.
Keep some pressure on it.
I'm trying.
Stay calm. Help is coming.
They left behind a sawed-off shotgun.
Don't touch it.
As soon as I thought they left, one came back for it, but I jumped up.
Your husband knew how to use the gun?
Yes.
Did you hit any of them?
No.
Did you fire shots?
Yes.
How many shots did you fire?
I don't know, a few.
Did they shoot back?
Yes.
Did you hear them leave?
I heard some doors shut.
What about now?
I hear cars driving outside.
They should be there soon. Please stay on the line.
I hope they come soon.
Do you remember any specific details about the people?
The woman was short and fat, the man was very tall.
Were they wearing masks?
No, but the man's face was painted black.
Were all their faces painted?
No, just the man's.
Do you know if he was the one who shot your husband?
Yes.
Can you think of anyone who would want to hurt your family?
No.
Where are your husband and daughter?
In the living room.
Okay, stay with me.
I hear someone pulling up.
Do you see any flashing lights?
No, I can't get up.
They should be announcing themselves.
They're pulling away.
Okay, stay calm. Do you see anything?
No.
Do you hear any movement outside?
Just cars driving crazily.
Units are there. Stay with me until they reach you.
Okay.
Please call my family.
We will call them. Do you hear anything else?
The gate might be locked.
Okay, stay with me.
Put your hands up and put the gun down.
I can't get up.
Just put the gun down and keep your hands up.
I'm in the kitchen on 911.
Is he with you now?
Yes, he's here.
Okay, I'll let you go now.
Thank you.
